name: L.A.S.E.R. (ludwigvons)
description:
L.A.S.E.R.

A Lud's game made in gamemaker studio 2

Press space to start the laser. Left-click and release to draw a line. This line will be a mirror for the laser. the goal is to direct the laser on the right of the screen in the blue gate and avoid the edge and cubes.  

No score, no timer and no transition between levels yet.

The game is just a prototype with 10 levels playable.

Enjoy the game, and let me comments.

Amusez-vous bien et donnez-moi vos impressions.
